rules.name: max
params: Mine Name cannot be more than 128 characters

rules.name: max
params: Mine Operator cannot be more than 128 characters

rules.name: required
params: Report Period Start Date is required

rules.name: required
params: Report Period End Date is required

rules.name: min
params: The Report Period End Date must be greater than the Report Period Start Date

rules.name: matches
params: Freight Cost must be a positive whole number with no more than 10 digits e.g. 1234567890

rules.name: vocab
params: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?displayText WHERE {{ ?id a skos:Concept ; skos:notation ?displayText ; skos:inScheme <http://linked.data.gov.au/def/qld-resource-permit> }} ORDER BY ?displayText
Tenement Type is invalid. Please refer to vocab qld-resource-permit

rules.name: matches
params: Tenement Number must be a positive whole number with no more than 8 digits e.g. 12345678.

rules.name: vocab
params: PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?displayText WHERE { <http://linked.data.gov.au/def/site-status/prodstat> skos:member ?id . ?id skos:prefLabel ?displayText . } ORDER BY ?displayText
Production Status is not valid. Refer to vocab for Site Status (Production Site Status).

rules.name: vocab
params: PREFIX time: <http://www.w3.org/2006/time#> PREFIX skos: <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> SELECT DISTINCT ?id ?displayText WHERE {{ ?id a skos:Concept ; skos:prefLabel ?displayText ; time:month ?seq; skos:inScheme <http://www.w3.org/ns/time/gregorian> FILTER( LANG( ?displayText ) = 'en' && LANG( ?displayText ) = 'en' ) }} ORDER BY ?seq

rules.name: matches
params: Production Year must be a valid year between 1900-2099.

rules.name: matches
params: Days on Production must be a value between 1-31.
